column1: Our nation continues to outpace expectations as we lead in the development of a SAFE and EFFECTIVE vaccine.   Thanks to @realdonaldtrump’s Operation Warp Speed up to 20 million Americans could be vaccinated against COVID-19 as soon as December.  https://t.co/2S075Zpye2

There is a lot of misinformation circulating about a COVID-19 vaccine but here’s the truth: President Trump’s Operation Warp Speed is following the science to develop a safe effective vaccine faster than any similar vaccine has EVER been developed. https://t.co/SF7T0G6eGO

As the House reconvenes I am focused on working for the American people and securing highly targeted timely and temporary COVID-19 relief.  It is sad to see the House Speaker continue to put politics over people in pursuit of the radical leftist agenda. #LetsWork https://t.co/pHTfOT2iCD
Pres. Trump’s Operation Warp Speed is developing a safe effective vaccine to defeat COVID-19 at record pace. https://t.co/re10IA8yeV
Chelsea and I are praying for the speedy recovery of @POTUS and @FLOTUS as they quarantine at the White House. We will beat #COVID19 together our best days are still ahead. https://t.co/YwzMb0y31m
FACT: Speaker Pelosi has refused to come to the negotiating table for months and is now blocking targeted COVID relief from reaching the American people.  https://t.co/y4asTBVDGE
To RESTORE our way of life we must defeat COVID-19 & keep Americans healthy fight to keep our communities safe and protect our Constitutional freedoms. https://t.co/KUMb9OMlWi

“It's a manmade virus created in the lab… I have evidence to show why they can do it what they have done.”–Dr. Li-Meng Yan  The evidence continues to mount. If the Chinese Communist Party (#CCP) is responsible for #COVID19 we MUST hold them accountable.https://t.co/aeTR7zszHw

America needs strong leaders who analyze scientific data AND balance risk to develop an optimal COVID strategy such as Pres. Trump’s Operation Warp Speed where scientists are working 24/7 to get Americans a vaccine ASAP.  https://t.co/7j7pBf5EYE

I signed onto a letter with members of the TN delegation to @FEMA expressing opposition to a recent policy change that would undermine the state’s COVID-19 recovery efforts by cutting off funding for important protective measures in our schools. https://t.co/tfr7DUFsdV

Speaker Pelosi is demanding bailouts for cities and states that were in financial trouble BEFORE the coronavirus pandemic.  TN taxpayers don't want to bail out other states’ financial failures. If America has vulnerabilities due to the virus let's address the real needs.

I met with family-owned motorcoach business owners about the catastrophic impact COVID-19 has had on their industry. Like so many American owned businesses the virus has stifled this industry and I am committed to helping them and saving as many jobs as possible. https://t.co/0BY3Z72hdD

TODAY: Join me LIVE on Facebook at 5:30pm CT for a virtual discussion about our economy and the coronavirus pandemic.   I will be live and ready to talk with you. Post your questions and comments below. https://t.co/n6ZEQxsQXU

TOMORROW: I’ll be LIVE on Facebook for a virtual Town Hall to talk about reducing unemployment rebuilding our economy and the House's role in responding to COVID-19.  TUNE IN at 5:30pm CT https://t.co/2qq2Eceepq

📢Town Hall🤝: Today I met with area small business leaders and entrepreneurs for a virtual public town hall. I appreciate the Upper Cumberland Development District for hosting this town hall focused on economic recovery in the COVID era. https://t.co/37YA4ULVMF

→ #CCP lied about COVID-19.  → #CCP is working to steal our intellectual property & jobs. → #CCP lied about military actions in SCS.  → #CCP lied about treatment of ethnic minorities.   The CCP cannot be trusted & I will cont. supporting Pres. Trump’s tough-on-China policies. https://t.co/SEgx66fqTY

The HEROES Act has no chance of becoming law. Today Democratic Leadership decided to hold a Financial Services  hearing on this partisan wish list instead of using our limited time to focus on practical legislation that responsibly addresses the coronavirus pandemic. 📺 ⬇️ https://t.co/b47gtREmPY

Today I recognized WHUB Radio on the House Floor a small business in our district who has been a voice for the region for over 80 years. Even through the coronavirus pandemic they are working hard to report news give information and provide entertainment. https://t.co/1aU9GMnMnj

We are experiencing a national coin shortage as a result of COVID-19 and banks & businesses are starting to feel the effects in Tennessee.  It’s just my two cents but I urge my fellow Americans to contribute their two cents by putting their spare change back into circulation. https://t.co/LD4greK5Wj

I am committed to being accessible to anyone in need of assistance during COVID-19 – that’s why I’ve been connecting with constituents virtually. Today I joined @endalztn's Tele Town Hall for a great discussion surrounding the federal COVID-19 response.  #EndAlz #TN6 https://t.co/QMp21E30df

TODAY: I’ll be giving an update on the federal COVID-19 response & answering questions as part of the Alzheimer’s Association’s telephone town hall.  TUNE IN at 10am CST & listen LIVE below ⬇️   https://t.co/4kP8vOLfG4  #alzheimersawareness #endalz #alzheimersassocationTN https://t.co/KsYz8vtkqf

Taking the census is tremendously important! Now more than ever an accurate count of our communities will help to ensure we have the resources to continue on the road to recovery from COVID-19. https://t.co/kaqTI4kmgT

I led my colleagues in sending a letter to Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell and Treasury Secretary Steve Mnuchin demanding swift action to address the coin shortage happening in our nation as a result of COVID-19. https://t.co/HQsQAJPPcR
I am proud to support our health care providers who have been on the frontlines throughout the COVID response and recovery. We will emerge from this stronger than ever. #TN06

Thanks to strong leadership & smart re-opening efforts our economy is on the road to recovery from the #COVID19 pandemic. The May Jobs Report surpassed expectations and reflects the success of programs like the PPP. Let's keep up the effort by continuing to #ReopenAmerica https://t.co/yov9NfHtoZ

In response to COVID-19 I was proud to support funding for Tennessee's rural health clinics. Our state’s health clinics received over $7 million in funds that will go towards ensuring rural Tennesseans have access to the care they need.

As we move forward with COVID-19 response and recovery I will continue to focus on getting Americans back to work and defeating this virus by incentivizing rehiring and removing regulatory barriers to job creation and protecting small businesses. #TN06

Last night I joined a number of my colleagues in urging Secretary @stevenmnuchin1 to move the tax filing deadline to July 15th. This is an important step of relief for Tennesseans as we continue to navigate the unique and difficult challenges presented by #COVID19. https://t.co/YbMx7rFfk2
For those reaching out to my office with concerns over COVID-19 we suggest following @CDCgov recommendations published at https://t.co/wMFMm35Pkh or call 800-CDC-INFO (800-232-4636).

Out of special concern for those at highest risk I continue to closely follow the status of the Coronavirus. Although there are no reported cases of the virus in #TN6 we want to do everything possible to slow the spread.  https://t.co/wXBJw70AbV
